name: Truck Driver Transporter
description:
Do you want to be a truck driver? Pick your truck, pick up the cargo and transport it to various destinations. Be careful you don't lose the cargo, but also, make sure you don't run out of fuel and try not to fall over the cliffs. Conquer the dangerous mountain roads and start driving trucks now!


Features:
-----
- 3 different transporter trucks
- upgradeable trucks
- beautiful graphics
- realistic truck physics
